nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.linear

Class LineSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.BaseGeometry<TActual>
      • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.OrientedGeometry<LineSegment>
        • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.linear.LineSegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometryConvertable<LineSegment>

    public class LineSegment
extends OrientedGeometry<LineSegment>
    A line segment, spanning two points. It is considered oriented, having one point as its designated start point.

    • Constructor Summary

      • areaSigned

        public double areaSigned()
        Description copied from class: OrientedGeometry
        Compute and return the signed area for this oriented geometry. Positive area lies "right" of the chord from start to end; negative area lies "left" of the chord.
        Specified by:
        areaSigned in class OrientedGeometry<LineSegment>
        Returns:
        signed area
